verbose_text: SFN mediated HDAC inhibitory activity resulted in histone acetylation at the p21 WAF1 / CIP1 promoter to enhance its expression in HCT116 colorectal cancer cells XREF_BIBR and BPH-1, LNCaP and PC-3 prostate cancer cells XREF_BIBR and mice XREF_BIBR that in turn promoted p21 associated cell cycle arrest and apoptosis in prostate cancer cells XREF_BIBR and suppressed tumorigenesis in Apc min mice XREF_BIBR.
evidence: histone acetylation at the p21 WAF1/CIP1  promoter
